utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Morning!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Oh, how was your date last night?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Pretty good.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh good. Ahhh! My God, sorry!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, really good. Anyway I gotta go; I’m late for work.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What-what?! You’re gonna leave this person with me?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah—Hey, don’t worry, she’s a terrific girl. And hey listen, could you do me a favor? When she comes out could you just mention that I’m not looking for a serious relationship; that’d be great.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Why?! What?! Are you kidding?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Just casually slip it in, y’know lay the groundwork. Tell her uh, I’m a loner—No! An outlaw! Tell her she doesn’t want to get mixed up with the likes of me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y’know what? That’s a lot to remember, can’t I just tell her you’re a pig?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, I’m gonna call her later! Honest! Oh come on, Chandler used to do it! He’d even make the girl pancakes! Plus, he’d make extras and leave ‘em for me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well forget it, I’m not telling that girl anything. That is not my responsibility.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Fine! Now, where’d we land on those pancakes?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, Joey kinda disabled it when I moved in.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Hi. I don’t mean this to sound like high school, but did he say anything about me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Would you like some pancakes?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: …Come on! Why are we here?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay take a guess.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The hot chicks?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Okay, okay, I was typing names into the library computer earlier, y’know-y’know for fun, and I typed mine in and guess what came up? My doctoral dissertation! It’s here! Yeah, it’s right-it’s right down here! In the biggest library in the university!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow that’s actually pretty cool.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh umm, there’s also a book here by a woman named Wendy Bagina. What is that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sounds like two people are really enjoying the Dewey decimal system.

utterance.speaker: Female Student
utterance.content: I’m so sorry!

utterance.speaker: Male Student
utterance.content: Sorry!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You didn’t bring me here to do that, did you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She sent the chicken back again?!

utterance.speaker: The Waitress
utterance.content: She says it’s to dry now and she wants to come back here and explain to you exactly how she wants it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well fine! I want to meet this chicken expert! Send the Colonel in!

utterance.speaker: The Colonel
utterance.content: OH…MY…GAWD!!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Lucky bastard! Janice.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: How are you Ms. Hot Shot chef with the big fancy restaurant with the best chicken ever!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I’m fine.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Ohh! What is that on your finger?! I’m blind!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh… Uh…

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: So, who’s the lucky guy?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: OH…MY…GAWD! I am so sorry sweetie, are you okay? You didn’t tell her we were getting married, did you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, she saw the ring.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did she freak out?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, she was shocked when I told her, but then again so were most people.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Right.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, she actually has a boyfriend y’know herself, named Clark. Uh, she also kinda invited herself to our wedding. Clark too.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You said no right?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You said no right?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, she corned me! She asked if the wedding was in town! I mean, what was I supposed to do?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Lie!!! How hard is that?! The check’s in the mail! Oh your baby is so cute! I can’t wait to read your book Ross!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on! So she comes to the wedding! I mean it won’t be so bad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What do you think she’s just gonna sit there quietly? You don’t think she’s gonna want to make a toast? You don’t think she’s gonna want to grab the microphone and sing Part-time Lover?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God, she’s not gonna like the chicken that night either is she?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know what? It’s gonna be okay. Y’know what? She’s probably not gonna even want to come.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! That was a lie! See how easy that was?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: So-so you would’ve just lied?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Would it really have been that easy?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Good, so do it Saturday night because we’re going to dinner with her and Clark.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! What’s up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey, who’s your friend? Hey!!

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Hey Joey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Erin! Still here!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, we ended up spending the day together and had such a great time!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why wouldn’t ya? Erin is great! Then-then there’s you guys.

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Ohh, listen. I’ve got to get going. Today was great, thanks!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Bye Joey. Last night was fun.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. I’ll uh, I’ll call ya.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh and I’ll call ya too!

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Or I’ll call you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And call me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, good to see you again.

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Bye.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Bye-bye.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Bye!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So, system kinda broke down huh?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Joey, I’m sorry I just couldn’t tell her all those things you wanted me to tell her. And y’know we got to talking and I…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: We want you to marry her!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: She is so amazing! You have no idea.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No idea? Who do you think brought her here?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Cupid.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Joey, she’s so cool. She speaks four languages.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Man, do you know what guys want!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Look Joey, come on she’s so perfect for you! I mean she’s sweet, she-she likes baseball, and she-she had two beers at lunch.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: My beers?! Look you guys, she’s a very nice girl. Okay? We had a good time, but I just—I don’t see it going anywhere.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, but you always say that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, maybe if you gave this girl a chance it would go somewhere.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look I’m sorry you guys, I-I just don’t think so.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Whatever.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, don’t start judging me! Huh? You’re the one who’s in love with her assistant! Huh? And you, you’re the one having the affair with the guy who keeps the pigeons on the roof!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Secret affair!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: People are doing it in front of my book!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m sorry?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: My doctoral dissertation is in the library at school, I went to see it, and there were students makin’ babies right in the middle of the Paleontology section!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Did you get to see anything good?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Let me ask you something, at your school was there a like uh a place on campus where students went to uh, fool around.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, there was. It was—there the corner of the library where-where all these dusty books that nobody ever read—Yes, there was.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great! Because people kept showing up, I think it’s like uh-a thing!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Now hold on a second, fifth floor against that back wall?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh for cryin’ out loud!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, so we should go catch our movie.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well now what’s the rush?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I like to see the previews. The candy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh. Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well look who’s here!

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Erin.

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Hey Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Well, we were just about to take off and see a movie. Oh no!

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: What’s wrong?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh Phoebe, we forgot that party we have to go to.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh no.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What party?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: A birthday party.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Who’s birthday party?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: Allison’s birthday party.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, and how is Allison?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wait a minute! Why don’t you guys do something?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, look how that worked out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Excuse me. Hi, I’m a professor here. Do you know the Paleontology section, fifth floor, stack 437?

utterance.speaker: The Librarian
utterance.content: Well, yes! Just give me five minutes, I just have to find someone to cover my shift.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! No!! No! Can I speak to someone in charge please?!

utterance.speaker: The Head Librarian
utterance.content: How can I help you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hi, I was wondering if it is possible to increase security in the Paleontology section? See I-I wrote a book up there and instead of reading it people are-are-are well, rolling around in front of it.

utterance.speaker: The Head Librarian
utterance.content: We are aware of the problem you are referring too. But as far as increasing security, I’m afraid the library is very understaffed. I, I can’t help you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, fine. Fine! If-if I’m the only person with any appreciation of the sanctity of the written word, I’ll go up there and defend it myself! And don’t you follow me!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: How did it go with Erin?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, unbelievable! We had the best time!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yay!! Oh so, you’re not, you’re not mad at us anymore?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No! No! You guys were totally right! This is so much better than the first time we went out. Y’know? That was so awkward, we were really nervous.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Didn’t you sleep together?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah that really calms me down. And! We have so much in common! She loves sandwiches, sports, although she is a Met fan, not much of an issue now but if were ever to have kids, well that’s a…

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my God! Listen to you talkin’ about having kids. Oh my Joey. Oh, please don’t get married before I do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh. Oh I just cannot believe Clark stood me up!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He might still show up.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh, what are you, stupid? It’s been three hours.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is that all?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: I should just go on to happier things, okay? Umm, why don’t you tell about your lovely wedding?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well actually uh, there was something we wanted to tell you about the wedding. Um, it’s going to be a small ceremony. Uh, tiny! We’re not even sure why we’re having it.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It’s actually going to be just family.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh…wait…you two think of me as family?! Oh, I have to ask you something now and be honest; do you want me to sing Careless Whisper or Lady In Red?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How can you say that?! The Mets have no closer!

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: What about Benitez?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What about Game 1 of the Series?

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: What about shut up?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You shut up! I love arguing with her. I’ll be right back.

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So how’s it goin’ with Joey?

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Uh, okay.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay? Wait okay, tell-tell me that you like him, please? I mean tell me that you like him.

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Look, he’s a really great guy and I know that you really want this to work out, but I just don’t see this having a future.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: But you said that you liked him! I mean what happened?! Did ya just change your mind?!

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Kinda.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Then change it back!

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: I’m sorry I… It’s just there’s no real spark.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No spark? Didn’t you sleep together?

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, tramp!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Does Joey have any idea?

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: I really don’t think he does. And y’know what? Maybe you guys could help clue him in. Y’know, tell him I’m-I’m not interested in a serious relationship or something.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you mean like that you’re kind of a loner.

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Yeah! That would be great!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, and maybe that you’re a real

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: I’m sorry?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh well, I guess Italian isn’t one of the four languages you speak.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! You wanna go?

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Yeah, let’s go.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. See you guys later.

utterance.speaker: Erin
utterance.content: Bye guys.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, see ya.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, thank you so much.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Wow. Well, I guess it was Cupid who brought her here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, just a regular old flying dwarf.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes? Yes?! How can I help you?

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Yeah, we were…we were just looking around.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh, you’re-you’re fellow scholars. What exactly were you looking for, hmm? Perhaps, perhaps Dr. Chester Stock’s musings on the Smiledon Californicus?

utterance.speaker: Guy
utterance.content: Uhh….

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ah… Ah…Get out of here! Uh, meeting someone? Or-or are you just here to brush up on Marion’s views on evolution?

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Uh, actually I find Marion’s views far to progressionist.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I find Marion’s views far to progressionist.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: I’m sorry, who are you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I’m a professor here uh, Ross…Geller.

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Ross Geller, why do I know that name? It’s uh—Wait! Did you write this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes! You’re the person who checked out my book?!

utterance.speaker: Woman
utterance.content: Y’know, you look nothing like I would’ve thought. You’re…you’re so young.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well I uh, I skipped forth grade.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am very…very sorry.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So how was, how was your date?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, it was great! I mean we walked all around the village. We went to this ice cream place, split a milkshake, 70/30 but still… And guess what, I’m thinking about taking her upstate to one of those bed and breakfasts.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh really? She said she wants to go away with you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no-no-no-no! It’s a surprise, but it’s gonna be tricky thought because she said she was gonna be pretty busy at work for a while.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe and Rachel
utterance.content: Oh no, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Jo-Joey, look honey we-we need to talk okay? Umm, I kinda got the feeling from her today that uh, she’s not lookin’ for a serious relationship.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Where are you gettin’ this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, she told me. She said she’s kinda a loner.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh. Oh.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No hey Rach, it’s cool okay? Y’know I’m a loner too! Right?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey Joey, y’know what? You are way to good for her.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah and honey I promise next time that I will just say good-bye and tell ‘em you’re not looking for a relationship.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! No. Don’t do that, just next time make sure she really likes me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well that too. Joey?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Do you want some pancakes?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Finally!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What are we gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I say we go with Careless Whisper.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Did she see us yet? Did she see us?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Janice, what umm, what are you doing here?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Well umm, I thought I was going to go back to my apartment but then I just felt I couldn’t really be alone tonight. I was wondering if I could maybe stay here with you, just I really feel that I need to be with family.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Our kids are gonna call her Aunt Janice aren’t they?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Please, it’s because otherwise I really don’t know what I might do.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Aren’t you just a tinsy bit curious?

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Do you have any tissues?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, in-in-in the bathroom.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Okay!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’ll just…we’ll just let her stay.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No-no-no-no, if we let her stay, she will stay forever!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Kinda like your Barca lounger.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that what you’re thinking about right now?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I never stop thinking about it.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Hey you guys, umm do either one of you want to get in there before I take my bath.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Janice, I’m sorry but umm, you can’t stay here tonight.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Why not?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honestly? Our apartment is a hotbed for electromagnetic activity. Now Monica and I have been immunized, but sadly you have not.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Okay, I’m going to need a comforter, but did you have a hypoallergenic one because otherwise I get very nasal. Do you have a cat? ‘Cause it’s already happening. Do you hear that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God! Oh my God! You have to go!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Because Chandler still has feelings for you!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: He does?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Say again?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That’s right. That’s right. And that is why you can’t stay here tonight. And probably why you shouldn’t come to the wedding.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Feelings, such strong feelings.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I mean, I realize that his feelings may never completely go away, but you can.

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh…my Gawd, I-I understand. I-I am so sorry, I’ll go. Good-bye Monica , I wish you a lifetime of happiness with him. Chandler, you call me when this goes in the pooper.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Don’t sweat it, I’ve got this section covered. Yeah, in fact I’ve got this little baby to shine in people’s eye——Okay, see you later.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I just wanted to show Monica your book.
